      Verification if time with taboo on account was finished
      Parameters:
      canReduce - flag, if true - taboo on account was finished
      Throws:

    • VerifiedAccountLimit

      public static void VerifiedAccountLimit(boolean verified, BigDecimal money, BigDecimal limit) throws BankException
      Verification if amount of money in operation not bigger than limit
      Parameters:
      verified - flag, if true - account has not got limit
      money - amount of money that account is needed
      limit - maximal sum of money that can be used
      Throws:
      BankException - if amount of money bigger than limit and account is unverified

    • VerifiedBalance

      public static void VerifiedBalance(BigDecimal balance, BigDecimal money) throws BankException
      Verification if money on account is enough
      Parameters:
      balance - amount of money that account has
      money - amount of money that account is needed
      Throws:
      BankException - if amount of money in account is not enough
